UnitTests Module

Defined in: test/ServerTest.js:11

Monitor Unit Tests

This module contains unit test classes for each of the core classes, and some unit tests for baseline probes.

This module provides the following classes:

  • ConfigTest
  • ConnectionTest
  • FileProbeTest
  • InspectTest
  • MonitorTest
  • ProbeTest
  • RouterTest
  • ServerTest
